Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Color (  Int  r_,
Int  g_,
Int  b_,
Int  a_
) 
 

Constructor with given RED, GREEN, BLUE and ALPHA components.

Parameters:
r_ - Red component's value. This is integer value in the [0..255] intervals.
g_ - Green component's value. This is integer value in the [0..255] intervals.
b_ - Blue component's value. This is integer value in the [0..255] intervals.
a_ - Alpha component's value. This is integer value in the [0..255] intervals.

Color (  Fixed  r_,
Fixed  g_,
Fixed  b_,
Fixed  a_
) 
 

Constructor with given RED, GREEN, BLUE and ALPHA components.

Parameters:
r_ - Red component's value. This is Fixed value in the [0..1] intervals.
g_ - Green component's value. This is Fixed value in the [0..1] intervals.
b_ - Blue component's value. This is Fixed value in the [0..1] intervals.
a_ - Alpha component's value. This is Fixed value in the [0..1] intervals.

Color (  Int  color  ) 
 

Constructor with given color integer value.

Alpha value sets as 255 by default.

Parameters:
color - integer color value.
r=(Byte)((((color&0xF00)>>8)*255)/15);
